question: NHL: Who will win Rangers vs. Penguins, scheduled for May 13, 7:00 PM ET?
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for May 13, 7:00 PM ET:

If the New York Rangers win, the market will resolve to “Rangers”.

If the Pittsburgh Penguins win, the market will resolve to “Penguins”.

If the game is not completed by May 20 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: 2022 NBA Playoffs: May 13th
events.description:
The 2021–22 NBA season is the 76th season of the National Basketball Association (NBA), a professional basketball league in North America. 

The league is composed of 30 teams (29 in the United States and 1 in Canada) and is one of the four major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada. It is the premier men's professional basketball league in the world.

The playoffs of the 2021-22 NBA season will begin on April 16 and will end at the conclusion of the 2022 NBA Finals. The playoffs follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series.

question: Poker: Will any player win more than 1 event at Triton Series Madrid 2022?
description:
The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to € 150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one of the players participating in the Triton Series Madrid 2022 places 1st in more than one event. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For more info about the tournament, please visit https://triton-series.com/triton-super-high-roller-series-madrid-2022. Official information from the event's organizers will be used to resolve this market, like https://tritonpoker.plus/festival/e5d259c2-2310-44a6-ae67-8885c481833f. 

If for any reason, the tournament doesn't finish by May 31, 2022 (11 PM ET), and none of the players have won more than one of the events, this market will resolve to "No".

The series will be broadcasted at https://www.youtube.com/c/tritonpoker.
groupItemTitle: Will any player win more than 1 event?

question: Poker: Will any straight flush be exposed at Triton Series Madrid 2022?
description:
The Triton Series Madrid 2022 is a series of streamed and televised high-stakes poker tournaments held in an array of the world's most luxurious locations. It features thirteen events with buy-ins ranging from €20,000 to €150,000 and is scheduled to take place from May 13 to May 25 in Madrid, Spain. For more info about the tournament, please visit https://triton-series.com/triton-super-high-roller-series-madrid-2022. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, at any point of the tournament, a straight flush is exposed in play. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No". 

A straight flush is a type of 5-card hand in poker, that contains five cards of sequential rank, all of the same suit, and for the purposes of this market, it includes also a royal flush. Only the hands that will be exposed by players will count in this market and only if they are either on a showdown or purposely shown by a player at completion of the hand in winning the pot.

Official information from the event's organizers will be used to resolve this market, like https://tritonpoker.plus/festival/e5d259c2-2310-44a6-ae67-8885c481833f. If for any reason, the tournament doesn't finish by May 31, 2022 (11 PM ET), and conditions have not been met, this market will resolve to "No".

The series will be broadcasted at https://www.youtube.com/c/tritonpoker.

question: Age of Empires IV: Will MarineLorD make the Golden League Final Bracket?
description:
EGCTV's Golden League, an Age of Empires IV (AoE4) tournament, is nearing its final bracket in a competition over a $125,000 pot. The tournament is scheduled to be played on May 14-15 and May 21-22, 2022.

The Elite Playoffs consist of 8 players split into 2 groups of 4, Group A and B, which separately compete in a round robin format for best of 7. The top 2 players of each group are selected based on scores. Ties will be settled based first on head to head results, then on which player lost the least games, and if neither of these points settles the tie a best of 3 match between the tied players.

The Final Bracket consists of these semifinalists who play in a single-elimination 4-player bracket for best of 7. From there, 2 winners will move on to the Grand Finals, which is best of 9.

For more information on the Golden League brackets and games this market covers, you can review the "Elite Playoffs" section at https://liquipedia.net/ageofempires/Golden_League

If MarineLorD moves on to the Final Bracket from Group A in the Elite Playoffs of the Golden League, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no players have moved on to the Final Bracket by May 27, 2022, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be https://aoe4world.com/tournaments/golden-league/results, however other credible resolution sources, including live footage of the tournament, may be used.
